Runtime.Architecture: Pure domain primitives; no Spring, JPA, Jackson, or transport dependencies.

Dependencies.Disallowed: Spring, JPA/Hibernate, HTTP, Kafka, JSON libraries

ValueObjects.Money: Amount BigDecimal, Currency ISO-4217, arithmetic with MoneyRoundingPolicy
ValueObjects.LocalizedString: Keyed or map-based localized text resolution

Events.DomainEvent: Interface with id, occurredOn, tenantId, correlation/causation ids

CrossCutting.Serialization: Provided by consuming services; shared-kernel does not depend on serializers
CrossCutting.Validation: Factory methods enforce invariants and throw domain exceptions on invalid input
CrossCutting.Testing: JUnit 5 unit tests covering value object invariants and arithmetic/rounding
CrossCutting.Versioning: Semantic versioning; breaking changes require explicit coordination
